recently.title: Recently
recently.description:
Every step is a search for my own light.

On this path, I quietly walk through every dawn | No need to announce loudly, nor fear loneliness
No rush to chase the distant, as my steps already dance gently in my heart | Every turn I take is a firm belief deep within me
Sometimes lost, but it's only to find a better version of myself | In ordinary days, I quietly await the moment when things feel different
It's those small, persistent efforts that make everything real and warm | Until one day, all the little pieces come together to form my story.

Today, I am taking one step closer to the person I will be tomorrow
